cont.entity_a: Wine only lost 10Â° after 7 hours, keeping it refrigerator cold for about an hour. Keeps wine cool for several hours. Works best if the wine is already chilled.
cont.entity_b: Keeps red wine at about 54 degrees, solving the problem of it being too warm or cold. Brings down the temperature of pre-chilled whites to almost freezing. Keeps wine cold long enough for two people to finish a bottle. Keeps wine chilled even in 80+ degree temps outside. Chills a bottle of wine in about 10 minutes to a perfect temperature. Keeps wine at the perfect temperature for an entire meal. Works well for chilling a room temperature bottle.

cont.entity_a: Attractive design with polished and brushed stainless steel.
cont.entity_b: The outside is sleek stainless steel, but the ice sleeve has old-fashioned designs. The cooler has a nice design but leaves fingerprints.

cont.entity_a: Large diameter fits even larger wine bottles. Some other brands have too small a diameter for large bottles. Only holds the 750 ml size bottles. Not a good choice for oversized bottles.
cont.entity_b: Works well but only for narrow bottles. Does not fit champagne bottles. Fits regular 750 ml wine bottles.

cont.entity_a: The inner edge of the lid area is extremely sharp, posing a risk of cuts. The stainless steel exterior is prone to scratches.
cont.entity_b: The chiller insert is hard to remove, raising durability concerns. The gel pack broke during the first use.

cont.entity_a: The inserts are thin, freeze quickly, and take little space in the freezer. Easy to use and keeps white wine at the right temperature. The cooler is wide, and the bottle doesn't fully contact the inserts for optimal chilling. Chills the wine effectively if the entire unit is kept in the freezer.
cont.entity_b: The chilling panel hugs the bottle tightly, making removal difficult. The bottom black base needs to be secured to prevent falling out. The freezer pack stays cold for about 10 minutes.

cont.entity_a: The bottle stays dry and mess-free compared to ice. Sweats a lot, which can almost ruin a table.
cont.entity_b: Looks decent on the table and keeps wine perfectly cool. The stainless steel cover looks good and does not sweat.
